control.visible: Window.IsActive(DialogVideoInfo.xml) | Window.IsActive(Home) | Container.Content(addons) | Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(sets) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(favourites) | $EXP[IsAnPlugin] | Container.Content(countries) | Container.Content(genres) | Container.Content(years) | Container.Content(tags) | Container.Content(studios) | Container.Content(directors) | Container.Content(actors) | Container.Content(files) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs) | Window.IsVisible(FileBrowser.xml)

!String.StartsWith(ListItem.Icon,Default) | [String.StartsWith(ListItem.Icon,Default) + [[Container.Content(movies) + !String.IsEmpty(ListItem.DBID)] | Container.Content(sets) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs) | [Container.Content(countries) + !String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(country.logos.path))] | [Container.Content(genres) + !String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(genre.icons.path))] | [Container.Content(studios) + !String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(studio.logos.path))]]]

[$EXP[InGameMode] | Container.Content(musicvideos) | Container.Content(files) | [Container.Content(studios) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(studio.logos.path))] | [Container.Content(countries) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(country.logos.path))] | [Container.Content(genres) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(genre.icons.path))] | Container.Content(directors) | Container.Content(actors) | Container.Content(tags) | Container.Content(years) | Container.Content(favourites) | Container.Content(videoversions) | Container.Content(addons) | $EXP[IsAnLibrary] | $EXP[IsAnSource] | String.StartsWith(Container.FolderPath,musicdb://sources) | String.StartsWith(Container.FolderPath,special://musicplaylists) | String.StartsWith(Container.FolderPath,musicdb://years) | String.StartsWith(Container.FolderPath,musicdb://genres) | [Container.Content(files) + $EXP[IsPluginShortlist]] | ListItem.IsParentFolder | Container.Content(playlists) | [Container.Content(movies) + String.IsEmpty(ListItem.DBType)]]

Container.Content(addons) | Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(sets) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(favourites) | $EXP[IsAnPlugin] | Container.Content(countries) | Container.Content(genres) | Container.Content(years) | Container.Content(tags) | Container.Content(studios) | Container.Content(directors) | Container.Content(actors) | Container.Content(files) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs) | Window.IsVisible(FileBrowser.xml)

!String.StartsWith(ListItem.Icon,Default) | [String.StartsWith(ListItem.Icon,Default) + [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(sets) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs) | [Container.Content(countries) + !String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(country.logos.path))] | [Container.Content(genres) + !String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(genre.icons.path))] | [Container.Content(studios) + !String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(studio.logos.path))]]]

[$EXP[InGameMode] | Container.Content(musicvideos) | Container.Content(files) | [Container.Content(studios) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(studio.logos.path))] | [Container.Content(countries) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(country.logos.path))] | [Container.Content(genres) + String.IsEmpty(Skin.String(genre.icons.path))] | Container.Content(directors) | Container.Content(actors) | Container.Content(tags) | Container.Content(years) | Container.Content(favourites) | Container.Content(videoversions) | Container.Content(addons) | $EXP[IsAnLibrary] | $EXP[IsAnSource] | String.StartsWith(Container.FolderPath,musicdb://sources) | String.StartsWith(Container.FolderPath,special://musicplaylists) | String.StartsWith(Container.FolderPath,musicdb://years) | String.StartsWith(Container.FolderPath,musicdb://genres) | [Container.Content(files) + $EXP[IsPluginShortlist]] | ListItem.IsParentFolder | Container.Content(playlists) | [Container.Content(movies) + String.IsEmpty(ListItem.DBType)]]

Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(sets) | Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs) | !Control.IsVisible(547) | $EXP[IsAnPlugin] | Container.Content(actors)

!String.StartsWith(ListItem.Icon,Default) | [String.StartsWith(ListItem.Icon,Default) + ![$EXP[InGameMode] | Container.Content(musicvideos) | Container.Content(files) | Container.Content(favourites) | Container.Content(years) | Container.Content(directors) | Container.Content(studios) | Container.Content(tags) | Container.Content(videoversions) | Container.Content(addons)]]

[$EXP[InGameMode] | Container.Content(musicvideos) | Container.Content(files) | Container.Content(favourites) | Container.Content(years) | Container.Content(directors) | Container.Content(studios) | Container.Content(tags) | Container.Content(videoversions) | Container.Content(addons) | $EXP[IsAnLibrary] | $EXP[IsAnSource] | String.StartsWith(Container.FolderPath,musicdb://sources) | String.StartsWith(Container.FolderPath,special://musicplaylists) | String.StartsWith(Container.FolderPath,musicdb://years) | String.StartsWith(Container.FolderPath,musicdb://genres) | [Container.Content(files) + $EXP[IsPluginShortlist]] | ListItem.IsParentFolder | Container.Content(playlists)]

[Skin.HasSetting(dont.use.landscape.tvshows) + Skin.HasSetting(use.clearlogo.on.fanart.tvshows) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,tvshow)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(dont.use.landscape.tvshows) + String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(landscape))] | [Skin.HasSetting(dont.use.landscape.seasons) + Skin.HasSetting(use.clearlogo.on.fanart.seasons) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,season)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(dont.use.landscape.seasons) + String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(tvshow.landscape))] | [Skin.HasSetting(dont.use.landscape.movies) + Skin.HasSetting(use.clearlogo.on.fanart.movies) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,movie)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(dont.use.landscape.movies) + String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(landscape))] | [Skin.HasSetting(use.clearlogo.on.fanart.artists) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,artist) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,album) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,song)]]
